attributes.action: Say NO to Council Snoopers entering your property for Council Tax reviews etc...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is against our 'Human Rights' to be forced (with the threat of massive penalties) to allow these so called inspectors into our homes! Yet more tax!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
